page.title: 04WITHYGROW'S FARM - 2.
page.content: Mr and Mrs Whittaker have been at the farmhouse since 1947. They would not change their farming life for anything. The{farmhouse}was built in 1485 (and extended at later dates) and will therefore have seen many changes over its 500 years. In 1985 it represents a traditional farm both in scale and scope - for example, the keeping of its own ram is quite unusual in these days of artificial insemination. Some things will never change - at the time of the survey Mr and Mrs Whittaker were hoping that it would stop raining!
